channel.title: Rum on Sidecar
channel.description: Recent content in Rum on Sidecar

item.title: El Presidente
item.description: 1½ oz white rum¾ oz curaçao or orange liqueur¾ oz dry vermouthdash of grenadineorange twist Stir all liquids with ice. Strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Daiquiri
item.description: 2 oz white rum¾ oz lime juice¾ oz simple syrup Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with plenty of ice. Shake well and strain into a coupe glass.
